name: There Are Dinosaurs
description:
In There Are Dinosaurs, you'll face the formidable challenges of resource management and dinosaur encounters. Construct and expand your underground refuge, strategically allocating rooms to meet the essential needs of your community, including food, water, power, and entertainment. Create living quarters, research facilities, farms, and training centers, all customized to cater to the unique requirements of your dinosaur-themed shelter.

As you delve deeper into the game, you'll encounter various species of dinosaurs, each with its distinct behaviors and characteristics. Some dinosaurs may be docile and cooperative, while others are more aggressive and pose a constant threat to your shelter and its inhabitants. Develop effective strategies to defend against these ancient creatures, employing advanced security systems, fortifications, and even training your own dinosaurs as loyal protectors.

Survival in There Are Dinosaurs is not solely dependent on fending off attacks. It's also about exploration and discovery. Dispatch courageous explorers on surface expeditions, where they'll scavenge for valuable resources, encounter new dinosaur species, and unravel the mysteries of the post-apocalyptic world. Unearth hidden artifacts, scientific research, and remnants of human civilization, all of which contribute to your shelter's survival and help unravel the truth behind the cataclysmic events.

As the leader of There Are Dinosaurs, your decisions will shape the fate of your shelter and its inhabitants. Manage resources wisely, balance the needs of your community, and ensure their happiness and well-being. Make tough choices during crises, handle conflicts, and establish alliances with other shelters in the region. Your leadership skills and tactical acumen will determine the destiny of your shelter and its inhabitants.

Are you ready to create a thriving community in a world dominated by dinosaurs? Can you protect your shelter from the relentless onslaught of prehistoric creatures and guide humanity towards a brighter future? The fate of humanity rests in your hands in There Are Dinosaurs!
